name: LazyDFU
brief: Increases boot speed by deferring non-essential initialization
description: LazyDFU makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper "lazy" - that is, it will not immediately create the rules required to migrate data from older versions of Minecraft to newer versions until it actually needs to do so. As of Minecraft 1.19.4 and above, Mojang has optimized DFU initialization enough that this mod may be no longer necessary.
